thread.title: For the Future of Live Streaming, Look at China, Says iflix's Grove

title: For the Future of Live Streaming, Look at China, Says iflix's Grove
text: For the Future of Live Streaming, Look at China, Says iflix's Grove By Share With a fast growing number of paying subscribers for online content, China is driving the live-streaming revolution, said Patrick Grove, co-founder of iflix, a Southeast Asian video-streaming service, at The Wall Street Journalâ€™s D.Live conference in Hong Kong.
